name: ext_R5_EpisodeOfCare_diagnosis
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: The list of medical conditions that were addressed during the episode of care
element.definition: `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis` has no related element in R2:EpisodeOfCare
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. element.short: The medical condition that was addressed during the episode of care
element.definition: The medical condition that was addressed during the episode of care, expressed as a text, code or a reference to another resource.
